full_text: Free Easy Knitting Pattern: Cute Rabbits & Easter Eggs Easter is just around the corner, and what better way to celebrate than with some adorable handmade decorations? This easy knitting pattern is perfect for beginners and includes a cute little rabbit and colorful Easter eggs. Each rabbit comes with a different outfit, adding variety and charm, and their faces are embroidered for a unique, handmade touch. You can even add a little ruffle inside to create a gentle crinkle sound, making them even more fun to play with! Finished Size Rabbits: 14 cm / 5 1/2 in Easter Eggs: 5.5 cm / 2 1/8 in Skill Level Beginner Techniques Toe-up Cast On / Circular Cast-on / Knit in the round / Simple increase and decrease stitches
name: Ravelry: Rabbits & Easter Eggs pattern by Mou Mou Knits
